original_text: In the morning, the ship was near to some land, but the sailors did not recognize the place. They saw a place on the shore where there was a lot of sand. They wanted to drive the ship onto the sand.
korean_text: 날이 새매 어느 땅인지 알지 못하나 경사진 해안으로 된 항만이 눈에 띄거늘 배를 거기에 들여다 댈 수 있는가 의논한 후

sentences.original_text: the ship was near to some land,
but the sailors did not recognize the place.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 선원들은 그 곳을 알아보지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They saw a place on the shore
where there was a lot of sand.
They wanted to drive the ship
